LanguageData.VREA_NeuroPump.label: neuropump
LanguageData.VREA_NeuroPump.description: A synthetic, android neuropump. Distributes neutroamine across all android subsystems.
LanguageData.VREA_AirFilter.label: air filter
LanguageData.VREA_AirFilter.description: A synthetic, android air filter. A pair of these creates an android respiratory system.
LanguageData.VREA_Neutrofilter.label: neutrofilter
LanguageData.VREA_Neutrofilter.description: A synthetic, android neutrofilter. Cleans up and recycles spent neutroamine.
LanguageData.VREA_MetabolismRegulator.label: metabolism regulator
LanguageData.VREA_MetabolismRegulator.description: A synthetic, android metabolism regulator. Helps maintain maximum energy efficiency.
LanguageData.VREA_Reactor.label: reactor
LanguageData.VREA_Reactor.description: A synthetic, android reactor. Once reactor is spent, it needs to be extracted and replaced.
LanguageData.VREA_OpticalUnit.label: optical unit
LanguageData.VREA_OpticalUnit.description: A synthetic, android optical unit. Allows the android to see.
LanguageData.VREA_AudioProcessor.label: audio processor
LanguageData.VREA_AudioProcessor.description: A synthetic, android audio processor. Allows the android to hear.
LanguageData.VREA_ArtificialNose.label: artificial nose
LanguageData.VREA_ArtificialNose.description: A synthetic, android nose. Allows the android to detect smells.
LanguageData.VREA_ArtificialJaw.label: artificial jaw
LanguageData.VREA_ArtificialRibcage.label: artificial ribcage
LanguageData.VREA_ArtificialSpine.label: artificial spine
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidLeg.label: android leg
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidFoot.label: android foot
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidArm.label: android arm
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidHand.label: android hand
